name: TremaBalls
description:
Play in fullscreen!

Make the balls meet in this precision puzzle game. You will need the precision mode to overcome these 5 simple levels.

Controls Left / Right
MoveSPACEShootCTRLPrecision mode

A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #211 with theme 'Insane Accuracy',  except the music which I produced a few weeks ago.
